column2: This protocol converts any overhangs at the cDNA ends into blunt ends using T4 DNApolymerase. The 3' to 5' exonuclease activity of these enzymes removes 3' overhangs,and the polymerase activity fills in 5' overhangs.

Add the following reagents to fragmented cDNA from step (Illumina, Fragment ds cDNA).5 (total volume shouldbe 50 _l):5 _l 10_ end-repair buffer (1_ final)5 _l 2.5 mM dNTP mix (0.25 mM final)5 _l 10 mM ATP (1mM final)1 _l end-repair enzyme mix.The standard 50-_l reaction will end-repair up to 5 _g of DNA; the reaction can bescaled up if necessary.

column5: Buffer, End-repair (Epicentre Biotechnologies, End-It DNA End-Repair Kit)
Nucleic Acid, dATP (Epicentre Biotechnologies, End-It DNA End-Repair Kit)
Nucleic Acid, dATP (Epicentre Biotechnologies, End-It DNA End-Repair Kit)
Enzyme Mix, End-repair (Epicentre Biotechnologies, End-It DNA End-Repair Kit)
Output from prior protocol (Illumina, Fragment ds cDNA)
The standard 50-_l reaction will end-repair up to 5 _g of DNA; the reaction can bescaled up if necessary.

column2: mix by pipetting up and down
Purify the end-repaired cDNA fragments using the QIAquick PCR Purification Kit.Follow the manufacturer's recommended protocol, but elute in a final volume of34 _l of Buffer EB.

column5: Follow the manufacturer's recommended protocol, but elute in a final volume of34 _l of Buffer EB
